title: Five Detective Novels Magazine
additional-notes: A note in the 1976 July-December CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the Winter 1950 issue, and was not filed until 1977. The presence of a note in the 1976 CCE renewal volume suggests there may have been an uncataloged renewal filed in 1976 for the first issue.

This magazine included reprints of stories originally published elsewhere.  Those may have their own copyrights based on the original publications, and we have not systematically checked their renewal status.
